    • Constructor Detail

      • TabDefinition

        public TabDefinition(ComponentEntity topLevel,
                     java.lang.String tag,
                     java.lang.String name)
              throws IllegalActionException,
                     NameDuplicationException
        Tab element to hold the content for visual representation.
        Parameters:
        tag - The tag used to identify this tab.
        name - The name of the tab. This will used in the user interface.
        topLevel - The container containing all tab definitions. If the container does not have the attribute that contains all tab definition information, it will be created.
        Throws:
        NameDuplicationException - If the name coincides with an attribute already in the container.
        IllegalActionException - If the attribute is not of an acceptable class for the container, or if the name contains a period.

    • Method Detail

      • addContent

        public void addContent(PositionableElement element)
                throws IllegalActionException
        Add an element to the contents of this tab. The element has to have at least the location defined.
        Parameters:
        element - Ptolemy element with location defined.
        Throws:
        IllegalActionException - If the element cannot be added to the tab content area, or if the tab content area has not been set.
        See Also:
        setContent(ContentPrototype)

      • getContent

        public java.lang.Object getContent()
        Remove an element to the contents of this tab. /** Return the content area of the tab.
        Returns:
        The content area of the tab, or null if it has not been set.
        See Also:
        setContent(ContentPrototype)

      • getName

        public java.lang.String getName()
        Get the name of the tab.
        Returns:
        The name of the tab.
        See Also:
        setName(String)

      • getTabAttribute

        public StringAttribute getTabAttribute()
        Get the underlying Ptolemy object representing the tab.
        Returns:
        The Ptolemy object representing the tab.

      • getTag

        public java.lang.String getTag()
        Get the tag used to identify the tab.
        Returns:
        The tag of the tab.

      • setContent

        public void setContent(ContentPrototype content)
        Set the content area of the tab.
        Parameters:
        content - The content to be used in the tab.
        See Also:
        getContent()

      • setName

        public void setName(java.lang.String name)
             throws IllegalActionException
        Set the name of the tab.
        Parameters:
        name - The new name of the tab.
        Throws:
        IllegalActionException - If the new name is not accepted by the model.
        See Also:
        getName()

      • removeContent

        public void removeContent(PositionableElement element)
                   throws IllegalActionException
        Remove an element to the contents of this tab.
        Parameters:
        element - Ptolemy element with location defined.
        Throws:
        IllegalActionException - If the element cannot be removed from the tab content area, or if the tab content area has not been set.

      • getElements

        public java.util.ArrayList<PositionableElement> getElements()
        Get all the elements on this tab.
        Returns:
        List of all elements kept on this tab.
